title: Total fitness in 30 minutes a week
brief_description: A simple, thirty-minute-a week program for achieving physical fitness is outlined and demonstrated by Dr Laurence Morehouse and journalist Leonard Gross. The film is very specific in its training techniques for achieving total fitness. The teaching methods are direct and easy to follow
